entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1527 adds support for the `/compact` command
https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1726 introduces an experimental planning tool
https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1705 security fix to ensure `apply_patch` is run through the sandbox for the session
entries.translated: `apply_patch`가 세션을 위한 샌드박스를 통해 실행되도록 보안 수정

entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1764 CLI now checks for new versions and lets you know if you are out of date
entries.translated: CLI가 이제 새 버전을 확인하고 최신 버전이 아닌 경우 알려줍니다
